original_text: And he will give grass in your fields for your livestock, and you shall eat and be full.
korean_text: 또 가축을 위하여 들에 풀이 나게 하시리니 네가 먹고 배부를 것이라

sentences.original_text: And he will give grass in your fields for your livestock
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 네 밭에 네 가축을 위한 풀을 주실 것이며

sentences.original_text: and you shall eat and be full
